The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 August is 277,516 (493 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 15 August, there were 6,804 new confirmed cases (12.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 August, there were 5,722 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 19% (1082 extra cases).
